Career Expert & Resume Writer with a passion for enabling career success!  ðŸŽ¯
August 19, 2010, Margaret was Stephenâ€™s teacher

Over the course of the past 2-3 years I have teach, advise and counsel Stephen Quinn in his career exploration process as both an undergraduate and graduate business student.  Stephen brings the passion and energy he developed as a student-athlete into his pursuit of career success in the form of an enthusiasm to learn and build new skills on the job and a strong work ethic to succeed.  Stephen's interests in entrepreneurship are bearing fruit from conceiving an idea in an MBA class, researching the market, testing the idea with local collaborators and now taking steps to bring an idea to fruition.  Watching Stephen move this initiative through several stages and into serious talks with local business leaders has demonstrated a drive and risk profile that many young professionals at the same stage would be unwilling to chance.  Stephen is not afraid to learn by doing even if that means making a mistake or two.

summary: I am the Head of Human Resources at Management Success in Glendale, California. I have expertise in recruitment,  employee relations, benefits, leaves, and new hire orientation. Management Success is the top automotive, collision, and truck repair consulting and training group.The purpose of Management Success! Is to enhance the quality of life and improve the standard of living of shop owners throughout the automotive repair industry. Learn About us: http://www.managementsuccess.com/AboutUs/company-info.aspSpecialties: Employee relations, sales recruiting, hiring and developing the right people, new hire orientation, recruiting. Hiring For: Sales, Inside Sales, Lead Generators, Sales Development Reps, Closers.
